data.name: King Arthur's Gold: Flags of the World Heads Pack
data.detailed_description:
This Cosmetic DLC adds over 120 unique heads (over 60 per gender) to King Arthur's Gold.

Each head represents a flag of the world. There are also Jolly Roger and Rainbow/Pride flags.
Use them to celebrate your heritage and bring some colour onto the battlefield!

Preview:


List of flags currently supported:

  • Poland
  • Australia
  • England
  • Ireland
  • Scotland
  • Wales
  • New Zealand
  • Australian Aboriginal
  • Tino Rangatiratanga (Maori)
  • Canada
  • USA
  • Italy
  • Germany
  • Russia

data.short_description: This Cosmetic DLC adds over 120 unique heads (over 60 per gender) representing flags of the world to King Arthur's Gold.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Dedicated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Dedicated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Dedicated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
